ygData.subject: Re: Azog an' Oogog
ygData.msgSnippet: Ya.  dat culd be a reson.  howevur, me concurned if de entiur fight consists if u missin?   out of how manee swings r u missin?  Wat els affects missin? Also,
ygData.messageBody:
Ya. dat culd be a reson. howevur, me concurned if de entiur fight consists
if u missin? out of how manee swings r u missin? Wat els affects missin?


Also, isn't 250 da max for a skill?

-----Original Message-----
From: Grant Vanderhule [mailto:vandergm@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 4:22 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] Re: Azog an' Oogog


From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>

i am now lvl 19; my 1hs skill is 100, and my 2hs skill is about 92. i
repeatedly change positions in fights to try to remedy my poor hit rate, i
have still fought entire battles where i have not landed a single blow. on
questioning some paladins (out of character of course 8)) i get the
impression that they have the same problem. maybe a low hit rate is a payoff
the two classes have to make for having other powerful abilities?
